analyzed: rakṣā kāla kara stavaḥ
om namaḥ lokanāthāya
mayā kṛtāni pāpāni kāya vāka citta saṃcayaiḥ

original: tatsarvaṃ hara me nātha rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 1 ||
analyzed: tat sarvam hara me nātha rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
nepāle dvādaśa abdeṣu anāvṛṣṭiḥ mahā bhayam
narendra devam saṃsthāpya rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
martya bhūmau ca pātāle duḥkhinaḥ bahu laukikāḥ
sukha vṛddhi karaḥ teṣām rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
yatra yatra gataḥ tatra sarva sattva anukampayā
samuddharasi pāpebhyaḥ rakṣa mām loka nāyaka

original: saṃsāre vyāpito'haṃ tu kathaṃ pāraṃ prayāsyate |
analyzed: saṃsāre vyāpitaḥ uham tu katham pāram prayāsyate

original: tvameva śaraṇaṃ tatra rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 5 ||
analyzed: tvam eva śaraṇam tatra rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
sarva deva mayaḥ tvam hi sarva buddha mayaḥ tathā
sarva siddhi mayaḥ ca eva rakṣa mām loka nāyaka

original: sadā kṛpāmayastvaṃ hi sadā rakṣāmayo'si ca |
analyzed: sadā kṛpā mayaḥ tvam hi sadā rakṣā mayaḥ asi ca

original: sadā prajñāmayastvaṃ hi rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 7 ||
analyzed: sadā prajñā mayaḥ tvam hi rakṣa mām loka nāyaka

original: yena yena kṛtaṃ karma tena tenaiva dhāritam |
analyzed: yena yena kṛtam karma tena tena eva dhāritam
yat yat icchām pradātāsi rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
sukhāvatīm na saṃprāptam yāvat hi sarva sattvakam
tāvat saṃsāra garte smin rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
jñāninām jñāna rūpaḥ asi duḥkhinām duḥkha hārakaḥ
kāminām kāmarūpā asi rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
pūjanīyā asi loka īśa praṇavasya sva rūpa dhṛk

original: vandanīyaḥ sadā tvaṃ hi rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 11 ||
analyzed: vandanīyaḥ sadā tvam hi rakṣa mām loka nāyaka

original: bharti vā bhartiko vāpi mitraṃ vā śatruko'pi vā |
analyzed: vā bhartikaḥ vā api mitram vā śatru kopi vā

original: sarvatra ca dayāyukto rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 12 ||
analyzed: sarvatra ca dayā yuktaḥ rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
lokanātha jagatsvāmin su bhakti kṛta cetasā

original: tvāṃ namāmi punarbhūyo rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 13 ||
analyzed: tvām namāmi punar bhūyas rakṣa mām loka nāyaka
aneka duḥkha bhāj asmi bhīṣmaiḥ vai kaṣṭa saṃkaṭaiḥ

original: dayasva cāvalokeśa mocayasva ca māṃ kṣaṇāt || 14 ||
analyzed: dayasva ca avaloka īśa mocayasva ca mām kṣaṇāt
sarva dā īkṣā asu sampātam vartayan kuru mekṣayam

original: astu te karuṇā mahyaṃ bhaktiṃ caivācalāṃ kuru || 15 ||
analyzed: astu te karuṇā mahyam bhaktim ca eva acalām kuru
rakṣā kāla kara
stavaḥ samāptaḥ
